definicja: Percentage of population living in an overcrowded household.
wyjasnienia_metodologiczne: A person is considered as living in an overcrowded household if the household does not have at its disposal a minimum number of rooms equal to: one room for the household  additionally, one room per couple in the household  additionally, one room for each single person aged 18 or more  additionally, one room per pair of single people of the same gender between 12 and 17 years of age  additionally, one room for each single person between 12 and 17 years of age and not included in the previous category  additionally, one room per pair of children under 12 years of age.
